model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
You job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Speaker B, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes" or "No"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: What position did you play, when you played soccer in college?
Speaker B: I ended up being the goalkeeper for most games, not the most exciting position. 
Speaker A: Exciting when it really counts though! Do you miss it?

MEMORY:
Speaker A used to work part-time at a supermarket, but now plays soccer as a striker and has a match next week. Despite not being into music, Speaker A is a member of a soccer team and enjoys playing in tournaments. 
Speaker A is a college student studying Humanities and wants to finish college before looking for a job, expressing interest in working in HR and appreciating the recommendation.
